firstAidSteps.title: Figure out what caused the food poisoning.
firstAidSteps.description: • Think back to the food you ate in the last 4 to 36 hours.

firstAidSteps.title: Decide if immediate medical attention is necessary.
firstAidSteps.description: • Food poisoning that was caused by bacteria, especially when it strikes an otherwise healthy person, is usually treatable at home.
